org.drip.analytics.creator

Class ZeroCurveBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.creator.ZeroCurveBuilder

  • public class ZeroCurveBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the baseline zero curve builder object. It contains static functions that build zero curves from cash flows, discount curves, and other input curves/instruments.
